summary: This is a forwarded email from a U.S. Attorney's Office (Southern District of New York) staff member to colleagues, noting that CNN has asked to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. The email indicates the media inquiry is preliminary and has not yet extended to questions about defense counsel's narrative.

persons.name: Berman, Geoffrey
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of the original email regarding CNN's inquiry about Epstein's arrest.

events.title: CNN inquiry about Epstein arrest
events.description: CNN contacts the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 6, 2019, the same day Jeffrey Epstein was arrested.
CNN contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to confirm Epstein's arrest.
The email notes that CNN had not yet asked about any narrative or spin from defense counsel, indicating the inquiry was preliminary.
The correspondence is internal within the U.S. Attorney's Office, showing early media coordination regarding the high-profile arrest.
